original_text: But perhaps a wild animal attacked it. Then your neighbour must show the pieces of your animal that are left. Then he will not have to pay you for the loss of your animal.
korean_text: 만일 찢겼으면 그것을 가져다가 증언할 것이요 그 찢긴 것에 대하여 배상하지 아니할지니라

sentences.original_text: But perhaps a wild animal attacked it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아마도 야생 동물이 그것을 공격했을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the pieces of your animal that are left
Then he will not have to pay you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 당신에게 지불할 필요가 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for the loss of your animal
